Kid.vnme: 1.0.0 [1st stable for 480x800 P screen by N Paul]

TextElement.Str:
SURM is a virtual-digital assistant program. Which can understand user commands-queries, perform them as task or services and even can answer them accordingly with the help of multiple integrated offline executable function modules as well as some online API services based function modules, such as Wolfram Alfa, Wikipedia, OpenWeather etc.
About app compatibility: This application's icon and contains are designed and developed by me (N Paul). This program is best suitable for stock android with 480x800 P, HD (720x1280 p) and FullHD+ (1080x2160 p) resolution's display. This is an open-source project (originally made by me, N Paul) and anybody can view, modify and rebuilt it. To download the project file visit my Github profile https://www.github.com/nirmalpaul383/ If you want to support me please give like to our Facebook page https://www.fackbook.com/a.new.way.technical/
User name(?) Current user name set to "%User_name_set"

ButtonElement.Str: Set that name as user name

TextElement.Str: To delete a particular just hold on that particular notes... Or, to clear all notes click on delete all icon
You can change the music path from here as well as via c-UI command(s)
Full developer guide and user guide can be found on my Github profile https://www.github.com/nirmalpaul383/
Pronounce every output(?) Currently this option is %Pronouncing
Are you want to enable this option ?
Select a theme (?) Current theme is %Theme_select

Now you can ask me...[+Splitter+]Modular and keywords phasing system is being ready... OK.. SURM has started...[+Splitter+]Myself SURM, a digital assistant program created by N Paul. How can I help you ?[+Splitter+]I am trying to load all keywords and modular programs into the system memory... Please wait a little moment... Done..
Ok ,sir now I am copying that number to your dialer :-)
There is no phone number to copy on dialing screen :-( Type the phone number to dial. I m wating..for... it...

Action.Str: According to my randomness "%AI_temp" is the best[+spliter+]You should go with "%AI_temp"[+spliter+]..hmmm...may be "%AI_temp" is right choice... may be[+spliter+]It is "%AI_temp" (my choice üòù)[+spliter+]If I were you, then I would have chosen "%AI_temp"

What to pick? I'm not sure what you're saying ! .......................................................... To use my randomness/decision making power you can ask me like (e.g.)
(1) can you pick a number from -100 to 200
(2) Choose from 5 to 20
(3) please select any of them option 45,67,78,90
(3) make a decision choice red,blue,sky,black
(4) what is best for me option javascript,java,python,ruby,c++,c# .......................................................... [ (i) options should begin with "option","choice","selection" and options should be separated with ","
(ii) If you want pick any number you shold enter " number " or " from " or " to " phase in your quere and then you need to enter numeric value ] ..........................................................

Condition.rhs: number */* number */* number/* number*/from */* from */* from/* from*/to */* to */* to/* to*

Action.Str: There is no phone number for calling :-( Type the phone number to and then i can call. I m wating..for... the number please type the number...

....................WIKI MODE................. Now you just need to type your query. example : "android", "google" , "wikipedia" .......................................................... Next time you can directly get answer your query from Wikipedia with this syntax: [(action phase) about (keywords)]
Action phase : wikipedia, Keywords: (your query)
example: "wikipedia about android" , "can you search in wikipedia about google" (without ") .......................................................... To exit from WIKI MODE just ask your query or enter "cancel wikimode" (without ") ..........................................................

Notes number %note_temp1 has been deleted [+splitter+] Number %note_temp1 has been removed from my database [+splitter+] Notes %note_temp1 deleted... [+splitter+] Operation successful notes %note_temp1 has been removed [+splitter+] Ok Done. I have forgotten about notes %note_temp1

Are you kidding me? There are no such notes in my database [+splitter+] Sorry but it looks like there is no notes for this number :-( [+splitter+] Total available notes are %Note_data(#) and there are no such(number's) notes to delete... [+splitter+] I have failed to delete that notes. It looks like there are no such notes... [+splitter+] Sorry but that number of notes(which you are referring) is not available.

%AI_random_outcome(%Random_selection) .......................................................... Tips: (1)to delete a particular note you can use following command: "delete notes number 3", "can you please forget notes 5", "forget notes 1", "clear 4 number notes" etc ...
(2)to delete all available notes at once you can use the following command e.g "delete all notes", "can you please forget all notes", "clear all available notes from database" etc ...
[ important note: you need to use "notes" keyword instead of "note" as "note" keyword may refer as 'taking note action' ]
..........................................................

All notes has been cleared [+splitter+] Notes register(database) has been set to default... [+splitter+] All notes deleted [+splitter+] All %Note_data(#) notes has been removed... [+splitter+] Cleared!. All notes are cleared...
User Name has been reset and set to %User_name_set

.......................................................... Tips: (1)to delete a particular note you can use following command: "delete notes number 3", "can you please forget notes 5", "forget notes 1", "clear 4 number notes" etc ...
(2)to delete all available notes at once you can use the following command e.g "delete all notes", "can you please forget all notes", "clear all available notes from database" etc ...
[ important note: you need to use "notes" keyword instead of "note" as "note" keyword may refer as 'taking note action' ]
..........................................................

Condition.rhs: screen */* screen */* screen/display */* display */* display/log */* log */* log/logs */* logs */* logs/text */* text */* text

Action.Str: To clearing something from my database , You need to tell me which thing you want to delete.. is that your user name ? or is it music directory ? or the Screen(all input-output) text logs need to be cleared ? or is the notes need to be cleared? Type in details below:
Music path has been reset and set to "%Music_dir_set" . If there is no such directory in your storage , then you need to set a proper directory first for playing music...

.................COUNT MODE................ .......................................................... Next time you can directly count number by using this syntex: [ (action phase) (from value),(upto value),(gap value) ]
Action phase: count example: "can you count number 2,10,1 for me please" (without ") [ this will count from 2 to 10 and the gap between count number will be 1 :. output will be 2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9,10 ] .......................................................... as of now you are in count mode, so just type the value to counting (just like "2,10,1" but without ")
To exit COUNT MODE you can solve a counting or you can use "cancel countmode"
..........................................................
What is the name that you want to set ? (type the name after "to" or "as" or "I am" e.g "to N Paul" , "as Nirmal", )(without ")
Music folder path saved successfully.Now you can listen your music. :.Music path is %My_quere1
Set music path to : (type the path after "to" or "as" e.g "to /storage/sdcard0/music/" , "as /extsdcard/downloads/" , "/music" )(without ")

Saved... [+splitter+] Note has been recorded [+splitter+] Done... [+splitter+] I have saved the note [+splitter+] Recorded...

Action.Str: Hello I am SURM (Simplified Upto Recognizable Modules) a Virtual assistant program with problem solving modules .Originally designed and developed by N Paul as a Open Source Project, and anybody can view/modify my source project files. You can download source project files from N Paul's Github profile https://github.com/nirmalpaul383/ .[+Spliter+]My name is SURM a Digital Assistant.My creator is N Paul. I am an Assistant program based on if-else conditions(keywords for calling a specific function/module) and modules(sets of algorithm(s) and logic(s) to solve/respond the requested question...[+Spliter+]According my creator and developer, N Paul, my name is SURM and I am a Digital Assistant Software. I can solve various types of problem, or do various types of works under one package on your commands at any time on-the-go. I can do task like Wi-Fi/Bluetooth on/off, calculations, counting, selection making, give you some information about something, opening other apps or webpage, taking quick photo/note etc... [+Spliter+]My name is SURM. Simplified Upto Recognizable Modules. As long as I have proper modules to do a particular task, I can assist you. I can can easily managed task like wifi/bluetooth on/off , math calculation , counting , open a particular application ect. If at any time, you think I am useless to solve a specific problem, you can also create your own modules to solve those problem. As I am a Open Source Project (originaly by N Paul [+Spliter+]According to N Paul my full name is Simplified Upto Recognizable Modules but,. You can called me SURM... I can assist you to calculate or count. At any time may be you need some information & I can also give you that. May it is urgent and you need to save some quick notes,Yes! I can also do that... My fuctions and their accuracy are actually based on the modules. The more efficient the module will, the better result will come. And as a open source project you can also developed your own functions/modules and add them to the project...

Math Value like: 56+89 ,tan(60)+sin(45) ,56+(89-79)*(98+566);
